13.title: Georges St-Pierre vs. Johny Hendricks UFC 167
13.plot: One of the greatest welterweights in the history of the UFC, Georges 'Rush' St-Pierre, defends his title for the 11th time at UFC 167 against top contender Johny 'Bigg Rigg' Hendricks.

1.title: Jose Aldo vs. Frankie Edgar UFC 156
1.plot: Nearly a year after stepping foot in the octagon, Jose Aldo will look to extend his win streak and maintain his featherweight crown when he goes up against former lightweight champ, Frankie 'The Answer' Edgar.

2.title: Dennis Bermudez vs. Matt Grice UFC 157
2.plot: Ultimate Fighter season 14 finalist Dennis Bermudez will go toe-to-toe with Matt 'The Real One' Grice at UFC 157. Grice is coming off an impressive decision victory over Leonard Garcia and will look to secure his 2nd consecutive win inside the Octagon.

3.title: Johny Hendricks vs. Carlos Condit UFC 158
3.plot: Johny 'Big Rig' Hendricks and 'The Natural Born Killer' Carlos Condit square off in the co-main event at UFC 158. Hendricks enters the Octagon enjoying a 6-fight win streak, three of which coming by way of knockout in the very first round.

4.title: Pat Healy vs. Jim Miller UFC 159
4.plot: Hard-nosed lightweights Jim Miller and Pat Healy are ready to put on a show at UFC 159, and move one step higher on the 155-pound division ladder

5.title: Junior Dos Santos vs. Mark Hunt UFC 160
5.plot: Heavyweight power vs. speed - see the dangerously hard-hitting Mark Hunt take on the lightning-fast hands of Junior Dos Santos at UFC 160.

6.title: James Krause vs. Sam Stout UFC 161
6.plot: James Krause is unbeaten in his last seven fights outside of the UFC, making it clear that he's ready for his Octagon debut. Facing him will be the fighting pride of Ontario, Sam Stout. Stout returns home looking for another Fight of the Night worthy win.

7.title: Frankie Edgar vs. Charles Oliveira UFC 162
7.plot: Frankie Edgar's out to prove he still belongs at the top of his new division while Charles Oliveira wants to crack the top ten by pulling off the upset in the co-main event at UFC 162.

8.title: Cub Swanson vs. Dennis Siver UFC 162
8.plot: Two ferocious strikers who also have submissions prepare for a bout that will reshape the jam-packed featherweight division. See how Cub Swanson and Dennis Siver are looking to make a case for a title shot at UFC 162.

9.title: Ian McCall vs. Iliarde Santos UFC 163
9.plot: An electrifying flyweight who quickly soared up the 125-pound ranks after moving from bantamweight, Ian McCall now faces Belem's Iliarde Santos who is eager to get into the UFC win column for the first time at UFC 163.

10.title: Hyun Gyun Lim vs. Pascal Krauss UFC 164
10.plot: Germany's top welterweight prospect, Pascal Krauss has made Milwaukee a second home as he prepared for South Korea's Hyun Gyu Lim, who is hoping to make Krauss his second UFC win at UFC 164.

12.title: Gilbert Melendez vs. Diego Sanchez UFC 166
12.plot: Two of the UFC's most exciting lightweights square off at 166 when Gilbert Melendez meets Diego Sanchez. Melendez is coming off a split-decision title loss to champ Benson Henderson and will do whatever it takes to keep this one out of the judges hands.

11.title: Jon Jones vs. Alexander Gustafsson UFC 165
11.plot: The undisputed and virtually undefeated UFC light heavyweight champion Jon 'Bones' Jones defends his belt against Swedish contender Alexander Gustafsson in the main event at UFC 165.

imdb.plot outline: They're the bouts no fan can stop talking about, and for good reason, as action-packed Fight of the Night battles like Junior dos Santos vs. Mark Hunt and Johny Hendricks vs. Carlos Condit show what mixed martial arts in the UFC Octagon is truly all about.
imdb.title: Fight of the Night
plot: They're the bouts no fan can stop talking about, and for good reason, as action-packed _Fight of the Night_ (qv) battles like Junior dos Santos vs. Mark Hunt and Johny Hendricks vs. Carlos Condit show what mixed martial arts in the UFC Octagon is truly all about.
